meanings.sent1: The crumpliest paper was thrown in the trash.
meanings.sent2: She wore the crumpliest dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The crumpliest napkin looked like a tiny mountain.
meanings.sent4: His crumpliest shirt resembled a ball of paper.
meanings.sent5: The crumpliest map was impossible to read.

meanings.sent1: The crumpliest blanket was warm and cozy.
meanings.sent2: After sitting for hours, his shirt was the crumpliest.
meanings.sent3: The crumpliest paper airplane flew the farthest.
meanings.sent4: Her crumpliest smile brightened up the room.
